oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Preconditioned iterative methods for space-time fractional advection-diffusion equations
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Zhao, Zhi
Jin, Xiao-Qing
Lin, Matthew M.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Numerical Analysis
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this paper we want to propose practical numerical methods to solve a class of initial-boundary problem of space-time fractional advection-diffusion equations. To start with, an implicit method based on two-sided Gr\"unwald formulae is proposed with a discussion of the stability and consistency. Then, the preconditioned generalized minimal residual (preconditioned GMRES) method and the preconditioned conjugate gradient normal residual ({preconditioned} CGNR) method, with an easily constructed preconditioner, are developed. Importantly, because the resulting systems are Topelitz-like, the fast Fourier transform can be applied to significantly reduce the computational cost. Numerical experiments are implemented to show the efficiency of our preconditioner, even with cases of variable coefficients.
